title: CARD: basic playing card
text:
Card

 Card (suit=0, rank=2)

Represents a standard playing card.

test_eq(Card(), Card()) #check that the cards are the same
test_ne(Card(), Card(1,1)) #test that cards are not the same
Card(), Card(1,1) #show the cards being used

(2 of ♣️, A of ♦️)



#test_eq(Card(), Card(1,1))

These are the basic building blocks for our Deck class

title: nbdev cards
text:
How to use
This library provides a card class for you to create, display and compare playing cards

Card(), Card(1,1)

(2 of ♣️, A of ♦️)



suits

['♣️', '♦️', '❤️', '♠️']

title: Deck
text:
Deck

 Deck ()

Represents a deck of cards

test_eq(len(Deck()), 52)


Card(1,1) in Deck()

True


a deck has a Card
